Package doa.engine.core

Class DoaEngineSettings

java.lang.Object
doa.engine.core.DoaEngineSettings
public final class DoaEngineSettings extends Object
An object of this class is supplied as an argument to DoaGame.initialize(DoaEngineSettings, DoaWindowSettings, String...). Applications can modify the contents of that object to customize the behavior of DoaEngine.
Since:
DoaEngine 3.0
Version:
3.0
Author:
Doga Oruc

  • Field Details

    • TICK_RATE

      public int TICK_RATE
      Number of updates per second, default value is 240. Increasing this value will increase the granularity of time at the cost of FPS.

    • CLEAR_COLOR

      @NotNull public @NotNull Color CLEAR_COLOR
      Background color of the render canvas. Default value is Color.BLACK.

    • RENDERING_MODE

      @NotNull public @NotNull DoaRenderingMode RENDERING_MODE
      Rendering mode of DoaEngine. Default value is DoaRenderingMode.BALANCED.
      See Also:
      DoaRenderingMode

    • AXIS_HELPERS

      public boolean AXIS_HELPERS
      Set this flag to true to make DoaEngine render axis helpers. Make sure this flag is false when shipping your application!

    • CUSTOM_HINTS

      @NotNull public final @NotNull Map<RenderingHints.Key,​Object> CUSTOM_HINTS
      User defined rendering hints. Initially, this map has default values set by RenderingHints. If none of the default rendering protocols suffice, programmers can set the RENDERING_MODE to DoaRenderingMode.CUSTOM and add their own RenderingHints to this map. This way, the rendering will take place using the user defined Hints.

    • REFERENCE_RESOLUTION

      @NotNull public @NotNull DoaVector REFERENCE_RESOLUTION
      The reference resolution DoaEngine will use when scaling the game window and its contents. The default value is 1920x1080.
